oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Abernathy, Elizabeth, 1834 July 23
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Elizabeth Abernathy, dated July 23, 1834. Illustrates the first page of the document. A page cites “recorded in book No. 10, page 367 and examined.” Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Abernathy family
